name: Portgas.D.Ace
effect: [DON!! x2] [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and add up to 1 Character card with a cost of 5 to the top of your Life cards face-up. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [End of Your Turn] Trash all your face-up Life cards.
